title: How to enter and exit the Safe Mode
answer: [Long press the power key until the the following windows popup.]() ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110279) Click and hold the “Power off” menu, the following windows will be popup, select “Ok” to reboot to the Safe Mode. ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110280) If you want to exit from the Safe Mode, only need to reboot the mobile phone.
